name: subsatoshi
tagline: small things can make a big difference
body:
### Introducing subsatoshi.
Subsatoshi aims to be the reference open-source implementation of the [Value Chain Distribution Protocol](https://github.com/ktorn/vcdp). In a nutshell, it enables the distribution of value across a large number of related stakeholders, powered by very small off-chain cryptocurrency transactions, known as microtransactions.

### How Small is Small?
Very small. We estimate that for our main [use case](#) we will need a granularity of at least 0.0000000000000001 (that's 16 decimals, which is double of what Bitcoin currently supports).

### What cryptocurrencies are supported?
At first we will focus on Bitcoin, but our goal is to support as many altcoins as possible.

### Authors and Contributors
Filipe (@ktorn), Marco (@marcoleong), and Gerald (@gestadieu).

### Support or Contact
Open an [issue](https://github.com/macausource/subsatoshi/issues) on our [github repo](https://github.com/macausource/subsatoshi).
